content.heroSubtitle: Work Directly with Simo Every Single Day via WhatsApp
content.heroDescription: The same proven system that took complete beginners to $300K+/month in 9 months. Daily coaching, $1M store template, and lifetime network access included.
content.missionText: With 7-8 years in dropshipping and currently doing $300K+/month in sales, Simo built his reputation on complete transparency. Everything is shown publicly on YouTube - no secrets, no hidden tactics. Just proven strategies that actually work.
content.aboutText: Unlike other coaching programs with weekly group calls, you get direct 1-on-1 access to Simo every single day via WhatsApp. You're not just buying information - you're getting the exact $1M store template Simo used, plus lifetime access to his network of payment processors, fulfillment agents, and ad specialists.

pillars.title: Daily 1-on-1 Support
pillars.description: WhatsApp communication every single day. No waiting weeks for group calls - get real-time guidance whenever you need it.

pillars.title: Proven $1M Template
pillars.description: The exact Shopify store theme that generated over $1M in sales. Setup takes 30 minutes to 1 hour with full customization included.

pillars.title: Lifetime Network Access
pillars.description: Payment processors, 5 trained fulfillment agents in China, Facebook agency accounts, and ad specialists - all contacts remain yours forever.

content.ctaTitle: Ready to Build Your $100K+/Month Dropshipping Business?
content.ctaSubtitle: Join Simo's proven coaching program. $2,000/month or $6,000 for 3 months upfront.

testimonials.name: Jackson (Australia)
testimonials.description: Complete beginner who lost $2K before joining. After 2 months with Simo, hit $100K/month. Now at $300K+/month and bought a second house with dropshipping profits.

testimonials.name: Richik (India)
testimonials.description: Tried dropshipping for 5-7 years with zero wins. Joined Simo in June, and after initial learning phase, now doing $250K+/month with $30-50K net profit. Travels with family in luxury.

testimonials.name: Average Student Timeline
testimonials.description: Most students get their first sale within 1-4 days and reach profitability in 45-60 days on average with Simo's daily guidance and proven system.

sections.title: Complete Store Setup & Strategy
sections.content: Get the proven $1M store template, professional brand naming, logo creation, and market selection with momentum analysis. Everything you need to launch in 30 minutes to 1 hour.

sections.title: Daily 1-on-1 Coaching via WhatsApp
sections.content: Direct communication with Simo all day, every day. No waiting for weekly calls - get real-time guidance on strategy, product selection, ad management, and every business decision.

sections.title: Product Research & Ad Training
sections.content: Master Afterlib, Facebook Ad Library, AliExpress, and Temu sourcing. Every product gets personal approval from Simo before you launch.

sections.title: Free Facebook Agency Account
sections.content: Save $250/month + 3-5% ad spend with free agency account setup. Handles restricted/suspended accounts through Simo's personal contacts.

sections.title: Trained Fulfillment Network
sections.content: Access to 5 personally trained fulfillment agents in China who handle branding, quality control, and sizing. You only pay product cost.

sections.title: Lifetime Contacts & Support
sections.content: Payment processor contacts, multiple company setup options (US/UK/Hong Kong), agency partnerships, and ad specialists - all remain accessible after coaching ends.
